Drone/Darkfate::

Darkfate

"There're the shuttles" said the male. "We have a double trouble 
here, in one side we should stop Hell beast, in other hand Glavatron 
requires our help to..." Darkfate's voice changed showing a unpleased 
tone "MAximals..."

The fist drone with Jetpacks arrived where Killfest where.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Last post till 10pm.
> 
> ::Killfest/Slayer/Greven::
> 
> "I'll follow along as soon as I get the jetpacks and can fly 
there," 
> Killfest replies, waiting for his jetpacks to get here.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Slayer lands the shuttle in the Black Fortress, exiting and 
carrying 
> Incarcinator with him.
> 
> "Lets get some CR time," he says to Pinsir, heading for the CR 
> chambers.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > He opened a comm to StarScream.
> > "Star, I'm heading for Hell Beasts base. I want you with me."
> > He looks at Killfest.
> > "Lets go."
> > He makes his way out of the base, and in beast mode, tunnels his 
way
> > towards the shore line closest to Hell Beasts base.
